value.title: StarCraft 2: Return of the LEGENDARY World Champion Protoss!
value.excerpt: PartinG is back! One of StarCraft 2's most accomplished pro gamers has returned from his military service in South Korea. He was forced to retire in 2021, but has now returned to the game. In this series from the Korean Starcraft League (KSL) he's facing off against the Chinese Terran player Coffee.
